flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Salazar had 7 x 12 = <<7*12=84>>84 oranges.
He reserved 84 x 1/4 = <<84*1/4=336/1>>336/1 oranges for his friend.
Ha had 84 - 336/1 = <<84-336/1=-252>>-252 oranges to be sold yesterday.
But only -252 x 3/7 = <<-252*3/7=-108>>-108 oranges were sold yesterday.
So, he had -252 - -108 = <<-252--108=-144>>-144 oranges left.
Since four oranges are rotten, then only -144 - 4 = <<-144-4=-148>>-148 oranges are left to be sold today.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 336/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
